name: mri_diff
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

inputs.description: First volume to compare (e.g., vol1.mgz)
inputs.name: Volume 1 File

inputs.description: Second volume to compare (e.g., vol2.mgz)
inputs.name: Volume 2 File

inputs.name: Check Resolution

inputs.name: Check Acquisition Parameters

inputs.name: Check Geometry

inputs.name: Check Precision

inputs.description: Do not check for pixel differences.
inputs.name: Check Pixel

inputs.description: Do not check for orientation differences.
inputs.name: Check Orientation

inputs.description: Do not check for file type differences.
inputs.name: Check File Type

inputs.description: Do not exit on difference; run through everything.
inputs.name: No Exit on Difference

inputs.description: Check resolution, acquisition, precision, and orientation only.
inputs.name: Quality Assurance

inputs.description: Only check pixel data.
inputs.name: Pixel Only

inputs.description: Take absolute value of difference (default).
inputs.name: Absolute Difference

inputs.name: No Absolute Difference

inputs.name: Difference Absolute Value

inputs.description: Compute percentage difference: 100*(v1-v2)/((v1+v2)/2).
inputs.name: Percentage Difference

inputs.description: Save square root sum squares with --diff.
inputs.name: RSS Save

inputs.description: Print sum squared differences over all voxels.
inputs.name: SSD Print

inputs.name: RMS Print

inputs.name: Count Differing Voxels

inputs.description: Pixel differences must be greater than this value to be considered different.
inputs.name: Pixel Threshold

inputs.name: Count Threshold Voxels

inputs.description: Store difference information in this log file.

inputs.description: Save difference image to specified volume.
inputs.name: Difference Image

inputs.name: Suspicious Difference Volume

inputs.description: Perform diff on voxels with specific label index.
inputs.name: Segmentation Difference

inputs.name: Merge Edits

inputs.name: Debug Mode
